### Tender Announcement: Building 22 Walk-in Cooler Renovations at Central Experimental Farm Ottawa
#### Solicitation Number: 01B46-23-105
#### Request for Proposal
The Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites contractors to submit their proposals for the renovation of a walk-in cooler in Building 22, Room 127 at the Central Experimental Farm, Ottawa. The renovation comprises the removal of the existing walk-in cooler and the supply and installation of a new one.

#### Description of Work
The scope of work includes the demolition of the existing walk-in cooler and the delivery and installation of a new walk-in cooler. A detailed description of the work can be found in Appendix E (Specification and drawings).

#### Key Dates
* **Site visit**: Tuesday, September 12, 2023, 10:00 am EDT
* **Closing date**: Tuesday, September 26, 2023, 2:00 pm EDT

#### Tendering Requirements
The contract will be awarded based on the selection criterion of **Lowest Price**. Contractors must respond to this Request for Proposal (RFP) and submit their proposals according to the instructions provided in the tender documents.

#### Link to Tender Documents
Tender documents, including the Request for Proposal, Specifications, and drawings, can be downloaded from the Canada Buying Service website:

* [Solicitation Documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8269/itt-01b46-23-105-final.pdf)
* [Addendum 1 Cover Page](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8269/addendum-01-cover-page.pdf)
* [Optional Site Visit and Tendering Procedure](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8269/qa-1.pdf)
